abstract: A panel on Wednesday at the College Board's conference in New York City explored the flaws of the current college admissions system.
snippet: A panel on Wednesday at the College Board's conference in New York City explored the flaws of the current college admissions system.
lead_paragraph: "We should be ashamed," Lloyd Thacker, executive director of the Education Conservancy, told a roomful of college counselors and admissions staff on Wednesday. Mr. Thacker was speaking on a panel titled "The Case for Change in College Admissions," part of the College Board's 2011 conference in New York City.

headline.main: Discontent Over the State of College Admissions
